text: To place a Death Notice, please call 305-376-8901 or email obit@miamiherald.com. Be sure to include: Your name, daytime phone number, address, method of payment, name of funeral home/crematory to contact for verification of death. To place it online click here.
title: Gloria Estefan’s mother, singer Gloria Fajardo, dies at 88

twitter.title: Gloria Estefan’s mother, singer Gloria Fajardo, dies at 88
twitter.description: Gloria Fajardo, who sang in Cuba, became her daughter Gloria Estefan’s inspiration in Miami. The superstar’s mom has her own story featured nightly in the Broadway musical, ‘On Your Feet! The Musical: The Emilio & Gloria Estefan Story.’
